700049f-a.title: Bronx: 135th Street (East) - Brook Avenue
700049f-a.text:
East 135th Street, north side (buildings thereon), at Brook Ave.,
as seen across the clearance from East 134th Street. The clearance
between the two streets is part of an extensive area which was cleared
for the construction of an approach to the Triborough Bridge.
July 29, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
